title.justification: The given text is a series of poster abstracts presented at a Biological Psychiatry conference, focusing on various studies related to psychiatry.

extractions.description: The paper consists of multiple poster abstracts presented at a Biological Psychiatry conference, each focusing on different studies that examine various aspects of psychiatry, including neural correlates of anhedonia, development differences in striatal recruitment, and genetic architecture of human cortical MRI phenotypes.

type.justification: The text consists of empirical research abstracts presenting experimental methods and results in psychiatry and neuroscience.
type.quote: Three anhedonia trajectory groups emerged... examined group by sub-task differences in activation of VS... analyzed structural and diffusion MRI-derived phenotypes...

name.justification: The studies focus on neural correlates and brain imaging techniques such as fMRI to understand psychiatric and developmental processes.
name.quote: ...neural reward circuitry... neurocircuitry... brain imaging, fMRI... neural correlates...

name.justification: The studies focus on psychiatric conditions such as anhedonia, suicidal ideation, and genetic factors related to brain phenotypes.
fMRI and other MRI techniques are used extensively in the studies to measure brain activity and structure.
name.quote: ...fMRI scanning during a guessing reward task... brain imaging, fMRI... MRI phenotypes...
